page.title: 09COMMUNICATION
page.content: We did a survey of men and woman of the average age group from 30 to 40. From the parents of{Beechwood}and Rivermead.{90%}of the women use {telephones}daily .Only{85%}of the men use it daily.The amount of{post}for the men was{90%}but ladies only have {11%}thats probably because men usually receive{bills}and{business letters,etc. When we looked at the {friends door to door}we found out the percentages varied quite a bit.To be precise{60%}of the men had door to door callers and the ladies had {80%,}thats because most ladies stay at home during the day. We were suprised that every household had at least one {telephone},some had 2 or 3. Nobody had a{radio telephone.
